outreachTemplates.context: When responding to job application emails or interview invitations
outreachTemplates.template: Thank you for your interest in my application! I'm excited about the opportunity to discuss the {{position}} role. I'm available for an interview and you can book a convenient time slot here: {{booking_link}}

outreachTemplates.context: When someone requests a meeting or call
outreachTemplates.template: I'd be happy to schedule a meeting with you! Please use this link to book a time that works for both of us: {{booking_link}}. Looking forward to our conversation about {{topic}}.

outreachTemplates.context: When following up on previous communications
outreachTemplates.template: Thank you for reaching out! I'm following up on our previous conversation about {{topic}}. I'm available to continue our discussion and you can schedule a call here: {{booking_link}}

outreachTemplates.context: When confirming interest in an opportunity
outreachTemplates.template: I'm very interested in {{opportunity}} and would love to learn more! Please feel free to schedule a call using this link: {{booking_link}}. I'm looking forward to discussing how I can contribute to your team.
